about_the_game:
Introducing the Backrooms: Realm of Shadows - Full Version DLC, an immersive expansion that plunges you into the heart of darkness and mystery. Unveil a new dimension within the enigmatic Backrooms, where shadows lurk and secrets whisper in the dimly lit corridors. This expansion is not for the faint of heart; it's a journey into the unknown, where the line between reality and nightmare blurs.

Expanded Lore

Delve deeper into the lore of the Backrooms with a rich narrative that unfolds across new environments, introducing characters and entities that will challenge your perception of reality.

Challenging Environments

Traverse through a variety of new, intricately designed levels that test your survival instincts. Encounter surreal landscapes, claustrophobic spaces, and eerie chambers that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Terrifying Entities

Encounter new and formidable Entities that will stop at nothing to impede your progress. Each Entitie is uniquely designed to evoke fear, adding an extra layer of suspense to your journey.

Immersive Soundscapes

Immerse yourself in a hauntingly atmospheric experience with an original soundtrack that heightens the tension and sets the mood for each chilling encounter. The spine-tingling audio design enhances the overall sense of dread and foreboding.


Embark on a thrilling odyssey through the Backrooms: Realm of Shadows and discover what lies beyond the veil of reality. Are you prepared to face the shadows and unravel the mysteries that await in this dark and unforgiving realm? The adventure begins now – if you dare.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements it can happen that you need to run the Game with "Low" Graphics.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 -64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
